title: Conjuration Spells
content: cts. 10 Turns18m Warlock, Wizard, Eldritch Knight Poison Spray Cantrip Conjuration Action 1d12 PoisonProject a puff of noxious gas.3mCON Save Warlock, Wizard, Eldritch Knight Produce Flame Cantrip Conjuration Action Inflicts Produce Flame A flickering flame appears in your hand. It sheds bright light in a 3m radius and deals 1d8 Fire damage when thrown.Throwing the flame immediately after you conjure it does not cost an action. Extinguishing or throwing it on subsequent turns costs an action Dru
